verbose_text: In cortisol treated rats, the Dwivedi group [XREF_BIBR] found decreased methylation in the promoter region of miR-124 on chromosome 3 as well as decreased expression of DNA methyltransferase 3a concurrent with increased miR-124 expression levels and decreased target gene expression.
evidence: methylation in the promoter region of miR-124 on chromosome 3 as well as decreased expression of DNA methyltransferase 3a
